# Department of Planning and Development

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1380 TTY 711

__

Email Us

12055 Government Center Parkway  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Tracy Strunk  
Director

# Final Actions of Zoning Cases

Final actions of Zoning cases, heard before the Board of Supervisors, Planning Commission, and Board of Zoning Appeals are provided below. Records for board actions go back to 1970, but older records may be incomplete. Final actions include approvals and denials; other board actions such as deferrals are not final and therefore not included.

Click on a section below to expand to view the report. Use the  in the lower right corner of each report to view in full screen mode.

## 

##  Board of Supervisors 

##  Planning Commission 

##  Board of Zoning Appeals
